authority-number.required: Enter reference number of authority you are renewing/varying

organisation.required: Select the type of organisation the authority is for

weapons-ammunition.required: Select what the company will handle

other-means-details.required: Provide further detail on how the prohibited items will be obtained

import-country.required: Tell us where the prohibited items will be imported from

other-details.required: Provide further details on what business activities will be carried out with the prohibited items

weapons-types.notBothOptions: You can't choose unspecified categories and choose a category. You must deselect the unspecified category option, or the selected categories to continue

weapons-unspecified-details.required: Explain why you can't specify the section and quantities of weapons/components being handled

ammunition-types.notBothOptions: You can't choose unspecified categories and choose a category. You must deselect the unspecified category option, or the selected categories to continue

ammunition-unspecified-details.required: Explain why you can't specify the section and quantities of ammunition being handled

authority-holders.one: Enter the full name of the authority holder
authority-holders.two: Enter the full name of the first authority holder

second-authority-holders-name.required: Enter the full name of the second authority holder

first-authority-dob.before: Date cannot be in the future
first-authority-dob.over18: Enter a valid date of birth. You must be over 18 to apply for a Firearms License application

first-authority-town-birth.required: Enter a town or city of birth

first-authority-holders-nationality.equal: Enter a nationality from the list that appears

first-authority-holders-nationality-seco.equal: Enter a nationality from the list that appears
first-authority-holders-nationality-seco.same-first-nationality: Second nationality cannot be the same as the first nationality

first-authority-holders-nationality-thir.equal: Enter a nationality from the list that appears
first-authority-holders-nationality-thir.same-first-nationality: Third nationality cannot be the same as the first nationality
first-authority-holders-nationality-thir.same-multi-nationality: Third nationality cannot be the same as the second nationality

second-authority-dob.before: Date cannot be in the future
second-authority-dob.over18: Enter a valid date of birth. You must be over 18 to apply for a Firearms License application

second-authority-town-birth.required: Enter a town or city of birth

second-authority-holders-nationality.equal: Enter a nationality from the list that appears

second-authority-holders-nationality-sec.same-first-nationality: Second nationality cannot be the same as the first nationality

second-authority-holders-nationality-thi.same-first-nationality: Third nationality cannot be the same as the first nationality
second-authority-holders-nationality-thi.same-multi-nationality: Third nationality cannot be the same as the second nationality

contact-holder.required: Tell us who we should contact about this application

supporting-document-add.required: Select an option to upload supporting documents now or later

invoice-postcode.postcode: Enter a postcode in the correct format, like AA1 1AA

invoice-contact-email.email: Enter an email in the correct format, like name@example.com

invoice-building.default: Enter details of your building and street

invoice-townOrCity.regex: Enter a town or city without including digits

invoice-postcodeOrZIPCode.default: Enter your postcode or ZIP Code

purchase-order.required: Select if you have a purchase order

storage-building.default: Enter details of your building and street

storage-townOrCity.regex: Enter a town or city without including digits

storage-postcodeOrZIPCode.default: Enter your postcode or ZIP Code

first-authority-holders-building.default: Enter details of your building and street

first-authority-holders-townOrCity.regex: Enter a town or city without including digits

first-authority-holders-postcodeOrZIPCod.default: Enter your postcode or ZIP Code

second-authority-holders-building.default: Enter details of your building and street

second-authority-holders-townOrCity.regex: Enter a town or city without including digits

second-authority-holders-postcodeOrZIPCo.default: Enter your postcode or ZIP Code

authority-holder-contact-building.default: Enter details of your building and street

authority-holder-contact-townOrCity.regex: Enter a town or city without including digits

authority-holder-contact-postcodeOrZIPCo.default: Enter your postcode or ZIP Code

contact-building.default: Enter details of your building and street

contact-townOrCity.regex: Enter a town or city without including digits

contact-postcodeOrZIPCode.default: Enter your postcode or ZIP Code
